_sText:
This is the first map i have finished and uploaded yet.

cs_metroli is a hostage rescue map for counter strike source. It is placed in a left metro station. I used less cubemaps and more nodraw textures than in the original version for reducing its data usage. I provided a story for everybody who cares.

In a metro station for the transport of dangerous materials close to a power plant a group of terrorists captured hostages and locked them in a main area of the place. The hostages do not have any protection against the radiation so hurry and free them before they wither away.

Planned changes (ratings > 6)
•minor texture improvements
•major texture additions and fixes
•soundscapes
•better 3d skybox
•balance fixes if required

I hope you enjoy it ^~^
[it could be used as a fight yard as well]
